subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] more suggestions?

No not at all.=C2=A0 I am here to see if there is any truth to any of this.=
=C2=A0 Nothing more and nothing less.=C2=A0 

What we inevitable get from y=
ou is insults, whining, bitching and woe is me.

The world is not out to ge=
t you Frank.=C2=A0 Stop with the crap and grow a pair.=C2=A0 Stop with the =
generalizations and absolute thinking.=C2=A0 If you want to make this into =
a religion then so be it, but don't kick the rest of us that want to look a=
t things objectively.=C2=A0 You are only making yourself look like an ass!
=

=C2=A0"Nature is showing us only the tail of the lion, but I have no doubt=
 that the lion belongs to it even though, because of its large size, it can=
not totally reveal itself all at once." 
-=E2=80=94 Albert Einstein 


"It =
is far better to grasp the universe as it really is than to persist in delu=
sions, however satisfying and reassuring."
--Carl Sagan


"There is no such=
 thing as an insignificant detail. Don't just look 
for what you want to fi=
nd."
-- Me LOL 




________________________________
From: Frank Sumption <=
purplealiengirl@...>
To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Wed, May 26, 2=
010 6:24:08 PM
Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] more suggestions?

=C2=A0 
=C2=A0So i=
f there's nothing to the boxes why the hell do you hang on these groups? To=
 feel smarter than everyone!?


On Wed, May 26, 2010 at 5:20 PM, Lizzie Bro=
den <yahuli69@yahoo. com> wrote:

=C2=A0 
>Because you are an egotistical k=
now it all that lives in a shallow and fragile little world that can't take=
 constructive criticism and viciously attacks anyone that questions your=C2=
=A0theories?=C2=A0 It can't be all hogwash because you might have an emotio=
nal investment in this, right?=C2=A0 So you go after anyone of opposition w=
ith the full fury of a raving lunatic?=C2=A0 
>
>That is what I am=C2=A0rea=
ding, but carry on.=C2=A0 Keep digging the hole.
>
>If there is truth to an=
y of this, then lets see it.=C2=A0 At this point I am real close to telling=
 you where you can stick your=C2=A0damn box!
>=C2=A0"Nature is showing us o=
nly the tail of the lion, but I have no doubt that the lion belongs to it e=
ven though, because of its large size, it cannot totally reveal itself all =
at once." 
>-=E2=80=94 Albert Einstein 
>
>
>"It is far better to grasp the=
 universe as it really is than to persist in delusions, however satisfying =
and reassuring."
>--Carl Sagan
>
>
>"There is no such thing as an insignifi=
cant detail. Don't just look 
>for what you want to find."
>-- Me LOL 
>
>

>From: Frank Sumption <purplealieng=
irl@ gmail.com>
>To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups .com

>
>=C2=A0 
>=C2=A0I'm ju=
st sayin'--there are a very few that act like all is known and can all be e=
xpelaned away. It's those few that make comments back and forth, between th=
emselves implying that all this is foolishness, and they know so much bette=
r. I don't know why why, but that stuff really chaps my hide!
>
>=C2=A0I kn=
ow for a fact that some of the voices out of the box, and other methods=C2=
=A0are imagination, as they tend to change from day to as perceptions shift=
. I=C2=A0have stuff form ten years ago that sound the same, and I aslo have=
 tapes from the first boxes that talk about what's going on now. I have som=
e voice segments for m years ago that are also gibberish and noise. 
>
>=C2=
=A0I don't need some duffus telling me=C2=A0how I fool myself. 
>
>=C2=A0F-=
S

>

>=C2=A0
